column4: Sorry... I'm new on Irc.... and it's all a caos :( can anyone contact me on private? Wanna run Beryl on Ubuntu Festy 7.04 with ATI X1600
ok...
lspci|grep VGA
01:00.0 VGA compatible controller: ATI Technologies Inc M56P [Radeon Mobility X1600]
I beg your perdon... I'm not able to understand in this mix of conversations....
can someone please contact me on private?
If  <crdlb> is answering to me to uncheck the driver, well... if i do it X won't start anymore
--------Is there a way to get your attention please?!?--------
ok.... i'm beging to contact me in private chat... i'm having an headake with all those messages and even dunno with one is direct to me and which one is not!!! :(
well... easier on private... but seems you are against that... I don't know why...
if everybody keeps their questions & answers in the channel rather in private it might help somebody else, or if the preson helping you goes offline, somebody else might be able to pick the help up
ok... so... any suggestion to run Beryl on Ati cards?
or any channel to ask for it?
!beryl > manolo_
<CheshireViking> what does     "!beryl > manolo_"   means?
you should have a private message from ubuto with instructions on where to find help with beryl
<CheshireViking> thanks for your informations!!!! ;)
did it come through?
still waiting for help.... looking at the infos you sent me...
still waiting for help.... looking at the infos you sent me...
ok, that info should help you get started, I don't use beryl so I'm not up-to-date on installing it
